text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt word and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to tell you about a new feature of
Amazon Aurora one of the biggest
challenges for database developers is
having to wait for a copy of production
databases to become available for
development testing maintenance or
upgrade operations cloney databases can
take hours or even days for larger
databases and you have to store a full
copy of the data itself which which is
cumbersome and expensive solutions to
speed this up can cost hundreds of
thousands of dollars and often degrade
performance of the production
database Amazon Aurora now includes a
feature called Fast database cloning to
address this issue using this new
feature you can clone your databases in
seconds without impacting the
performance of the production database
clones are ready to use in a few minutes
and by using the copy on right
capability of the Aurora storage engine
they are small easy to manage and cost
efficient fast database cloning allows
developers to quickly create as many
database copies as needed it eliminates
the need for expensive third party tools
and also lowers your overall storage
requirements and costs fast database
cloning is available for all customers
starting today thanks a lot
[Music]
